channel.title: Elizabeth May
channel.description: Recent news about Elizabeth May, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Spoke at the Finance committee
item.description:
on Bill C-60, An Act to implement certain provisions of the budget tabled ...
Thank you. I again wish to place on the record that in submitting to the finance committee's request that I provide amendments, with the instruction to ...

item.title: Spoke at the Industry committee
item.description:
on Subject Matter of Clauses 136 to 154 (Investment Canada Act) of Bill ...
Yes, I think it's the United States, the U.K., China, Japan, and Germany that would have reviews that would be triggered by an actually defined term ...

An Act to amend the Canada Elections Act (local endorsement of candidate)

item.title: Introduced legislation
